#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int N, M;
int a[500001];

int lowerBound(int num){
    int start = 0, end = N, mid = 0;
    while (start < end) {
        mid = (start+end)/2;
        if (a[mid] < num) {
            start = mid + 1;
        } else {
            end = mid;
        }
    }
    return end + 1;
}

int upperBound(int num){
    int start = 0, end = N, mid = 0;
    while (start < end) {
        mid = (start+end)/2;
        if (a[mid] <= num) {
            start = mid + 1;
        } else {
            end = mid;
        }
    }
    return end + 1;
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);
    cin >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) cin >> a[i];
    sort(a, a+N);

    cin >> M;
    for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
        int num, ans = 0;
        cin >> num;
        int low = lowerBound(num);
        int high = upperBound(num);
        if (low != high) ans = high-low;
        cout << ans << " ";
    }
    return 0;
}

ë°±ì¤€(1654ë²ˆ) - ëœì„  ìë¥´ê¸°

ìƒê°

ì´ë¶„ íƒìƒ‰ ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤. ì´ì „ì˜ ë¬¸ì œë“¤ê³¼ ë§ˆì°¬ê°€ì§€ë¡œ, ê°’ì„ ì œì‹œí•˜ê³  ê·¸ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë¶„ê¸°ë¥¼ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì¤‘ìš”í•˜ë‹¤. ì´ ë•Œ, ì–´ëŠ ì˜ì—­ì—ì„œ ë‹µì´ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ”ì§€ë¥¼ ì˜ ì²´í¬í•˜ê³ , ë‹µì˜ í›„ë³´ë¥¼ ê¸°ë¡í•´ë‘ëŠ” í–‰ìœ„ê°€ ì¤‘ìš”í•˜ë‹¤.

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll K, N;
ll a[10001];

ll f(ll sug){
    ll count = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
        count += (a[i]/sug);
    }
    return count;
}

int main(){
    cin >> K >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
        cin >> a[i];
    }
    sort(a, a+K);
    ll start = 1, end = (1LL << 31)-1, mid = 0, ans = -1;
    while (start <= end) {
        mid = (start+end)/2;
        ll count = f(mid);

        if (count < N) {
            end = mid - 1;
        } else {
            ans = max(ans, mid);
            start = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}

  3. ê·¸ ë°˜í™˜í•œ ê°’(ì¦‰ ë‚´ê°€ ì œì‹œí•œ ê±°ë¦¬ë¡œ ê³µìœ ê¸°ë¥¼ ì„¤ì¹˜í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ëŒ€ìˆ˜)ì´ Cì™€ ì–´ë–¤ì§€ ë¹„êµí•œë‹¤.
  4. Cë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ë‹¤ë©´ ê±°ë¦¬ë¥¼ ë„ˆë¬´ í¬ê²Œ ì¡ì•˜ìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ê±°ë¦¬ë¥¼ ì¤„ì—¬ì„œ ì œì‹œí•œë‹¤.

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int N, C;
int a[200000];

int f(int num){
    int count = 1;
    int before = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < N; i++) {
        if (a[i]-a[before] >= num) {
            count++;
            before = i;
        }
    }
    return count;
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);

    cin >> N >> C;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) cin >> a[i];
    sort(a, a+N);

    int start = 1, end = 1e9, ans = 0;

    while (start <= end) {
        int mid = (start+end)/2;
        int count = f(mid);

        if (count < C) {
            end = mid - 1;
        } else {
            ans = max(ans, mid);
            start = mid + 1;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << '\n';
    return 0;
}

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int MAX = 1000000;
int N, ans = 0;
int a[MAX+1];
vector<int> v;

void push(int num){
    if (v.back() < num) v.push_back(num);
    else {
        auto p = lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), num);
        *p = num;
    }
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);

    cin >> N;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) cin >> a[i];

    v.push_back(MAX);
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) push(a[i]);
    cout << v.size() << '\n';
    return 0;
}

#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[201];
int find(int x) {
   if (x == a[x]) return x;
   return a[x] = find(a[x]);
}
void Union(int x, int y) {
   x = find(x);
   y = find(y);
   a[x] = y;
}
int main(void) {
   int n, m;
   cin >> n >> m;
   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
      a[i] = i;
   }
   for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
      for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {
         int input;
         cin >> input;
         if (input) {
            Union(i, j);
         }
      }
   }
   int route[1000], par;
   for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
      cin >> route[i];
      if (i == 0) {
         par = find(route[i]);
      }
      else {
         if (par != find(route[i])) {
            cout << "NO";
            return 0;
         }
      }
   }
   cout << "YES";
}

ll f(ll num){
    ll count = 0, numbering, current = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {

            current = i * N;

}

ì´ ê³¼ì •ì„ ê±°ì¹˜ê²Œ ë˜ë©´ì„œ ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ í•˜ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ì€, ìµœëŒ€í•œ Kì™€ ê°™ì€ ê°’ì„ ì°¾ëŠ”ë‹¤ ì´ë‹¤. ì´ëŸ¬í•œ ë°©ë²•ì€ ê³§, ê°™ì€ countê°’ì´ ë‚˜ì˜¤ë”ë¼ë„, ê·¸ ê°™ì€ countê°’ì´ ì²˜ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ë“±ì¥í•˜ëŠ” ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ë‹µìœ¼ë¡œ ì±„íƒí•œë‹¤. ë¼ëŠ” ì˜ë¯¸ì™€ ì¼ì¹˜í•œë‹¤.

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll MAX_NUM = 10000000000;
ll N, K;

ll f(ll num){
    ll count = 0, numbering, current = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
        if (num/i > N) {
            numbering = N;
            current = i * N;
        } else {
            numbering = num/i;
            current = num/i * i;
        }
        count += numbering;
    }
    return count;
}

int main(){
    cin >> N >> K;

    ll ans = 0;
    ll start = 1, end = min(MAX_NUM, N*N);

    while (start <= end) {
        ll mid = (start+end)/2;
        ll count = f(mid);
        if (count < K) {
            start = mid+1;
        } else {
            ans = mid;
            end = mid-1;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << '\n';
}

item.description:
ê³¨ë“œ3 : ê·¸ë˜í”„ ë¬¸ì œì´ë‹¤.
ë°±ì¤€(4991ë²ˆ) - ë¡œë´‡ ì²­ì†Œê¸°

ìƒê°

í˜„ì¬ ì‹œì‘ ìœ„ì¹˜ì—ì„œ ë‹¤ìŒ ì“°ë ˆê¸°ë¥¼ ì¹˜ìš°ê³ , ê·¸ ìœ„ì¹˜ì—ì„œ ë‹¤ì‹œ ë‹¤ìŒ ê²½ë¡œë¥¼ íƒìƒ‰í•˜ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ í’€ë ¤ í–ˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ì½”ë“œë¥¼ ì§œë©´ì„œë„ íƒìƒ‰ê³¼ì •ì´ ê³„ì†í•˜ì—¬ ì¤‘ë³µë˜ì„œ ì–´ë–»ê²Œ í’€ì–´ì•¼ í• ì§€ ê³ ë¯¼ì„ ë§ì´í–ˆë‹¤.

ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ Code

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>
#define INF 999999999
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int, int> PI;


int W, H;
char map[21][21];
int check[21][21];
int dy[4] = {0, -1, 0, 1}, dx[4] = {1, 0, -1, 0};

int ans;

vector<PI> trash;
PI start;

void printMap(){
    cout << "Map" << '\n';
    for (int i = 0; i < H; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < W; j++) {
            cout << map[i][j];
        }cout << '\n' << '\n';
    }
}

void printCheck(){
    cout << "Check" << '\n';
    for (int i = 0; i < H; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < W; j++) {
            cout << setw(3) <<check[i][j];
        }cout << '\n' << '\n';
    }
}

void bfs(PI start){
    memset(check, -1, sizeof(check));
    queue<pair<PI, int>> q;
    q.push(make_pair(start, 0));
    check[start.first][start.second] = 0;

    while (!q.empty()) {
        int now_y = q.front().first.first, now_x = q.front().first.second;
        int count = q.front().second;
        q.pop();

        count++;
        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            int next_y = now_y + dy[i], next_x = now_x + dx[i];
            if (0 <= next_y && next_y < H && 0 <= next_x && next_x < W && map[next_y][next_x] != 'x') {
                if (check[next_y][next_x] == -1) {
                    q.push(make_pair(make_pair(next_y, next_x), count));
                    check[next_y][next_x] = count;
                }

            }
        }
    }
//    printCheck();
}


void go(int depth, PI start, int count){
//    printMap();
    if (depth == trash.size()) {
        ans = min(ans, count);
        return;
    }

//    memset(check, 0, sizeof(check));
    for (int i = 0; i < trash.size(); i++) {
        int now_y = trash[i].first, now_x = trash[i].second;
        if (map[now_y][now_x] == '*'){
            bfs(start);
            if (check[now_y][now_x] != 0) {
                map[start.first][start.second] = '.';
                map[now_y][now_x] = 'o';

                go(depth+1, trash[i], count+check[now_y][now_x]);
                map[now_y][now_x] = '*';
                map[start.first][start.second] = 'o';
            }
        }
    }
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);

    while (true) {
        cin >> W >> H;
        ans = INF;
        trash.clear();
        if (W == 0 && H == 0) {
            return 0;
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < H; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < W; j++) {
                cin >> map[i][j];
                if (map[i][j] == 'o') {
                    start = make_pair(i, j);
                }
                if (map[i][j] == '*') {
                    trash.push_back(make_pair(i, j));
                }
            }
        }

        go(0, start, 0);

        if (ans == INF) {
            cout << -1 << '\n';
        } else {
            cout << ans << '\n';
        }
    }
}

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<queue>
#include<functional>
#define INF 999999999
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int, int> PI;

int N, M;
char map[21][21];
int check[21][21];
int node[11][11];
int dy[4] = {0, -1, 0, 1}, dx[4] = {1, 0, -1, 0};
vector<PI> trash;
int ans;

void printCheck(){
    cout << "Check" << '\n';
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < M; j++) {
            cout << setw(3) << check[i][j];
        }cout << '\n' << '\n';
    }
}

void printNode(){
    for (int i = 0; i < trash.size(); i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < trash.size(); j++) {
            cout << setw(3) << node[i][j];
        }cout << '\n';
    }
}

void bfs(PI start){
    queue<PI> q;
    q.push(start);
    check[q.front().first][q.front().second] = 0;

    while (!q.empty()) {
        int now_y = q.front().first, now_x = q.front().second;
        q.pop();
        int count = check[now_y][now_x];

        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
            int next_y = now_y + dy[i], next_x = now_x + dx[i];
            if (0 <= next_y && next_y < N && 0 <= next_x && next_x < M && map[next_y][next_x] != 'x') {
                if (check[next_y][next_x] == -1) {
                    check[next_y][next_x] = count+1;
                    q.push(make_pair(next_y, next_x));
//                    printCheck();
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);

    while (true) {
        cin >> M >> N;
        // ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ë°°ì—´ ì´ˆê¸°í™”
        trash.clear();
        ans = INF;
        memset(node, 0, sizeof(node));

        if (M == 0 && N == 0) return 0; // ì¢…ë£Œ ì¡°ê±´

        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j < M; j++) {
                cin >> map[i][j];
                if (map[i][j] == 'o') trash.insert(trash.begin(), make_pair(i, j)); // ì‹œì‘ ìœ„ì¹˜ëŠ” 0ì— ê³ ì •
                if (map[i][j] == '*') trash.push_back(make_pair(i, j));
            }
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < trash.size(); i++) {
            memset(check, -1, sizeof(check));
            bfs(trash[i]);
            for (int j = i; j < trash.size(); j++) {
                node[i][j] = check[trash[j].first][trash[j].second];
                node[j][i] = check[trash[j].first][trash[j].second];
            }
        }
//        printNode();

        vector<int> p; // ìˆœì—´ì„ ìœ„í•œ ë°°ì—´ ìƒì„±
        for (int i = 1; i < trash.size(); i++) p.push_back(i);

        do{
            p.insert(p.begin(), 0); // ì‹œì‘ ìœ„ì¹˜ ì¶”ê°€
            int localAns = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < p.size()-1; i++) {
                localAns += node[p[i]][p[i+1]];
                if (node[p[i]][p[i+1]] == -1) {
                    ans = -1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            ans = min(ans, localAns);
            p.erase(p.begin()); // ì‹œì‘ ìœ„ì¹˜ ì‚­ì œ
        }while(next_permutation(p.begin(), p.end()));

        cout << ans << '\n';
    }
    return 0;
}

ê·¸ëŸ°ë° ê°™ì€ ìƒí™©ì—ì„œ ì´ë²ˆì—ëŠ” 5ê°€ ë“¤ì–´ì™”ë‹¤ê³  ìƒê°í•´ë³´ì. ê·¸ë ‡ë‹¤ë©´ ì´ windowì—ì„œ ìµœëŒ€ ê°ì†Œ ìˆ˜ì—´ì€ ë³€ê²½ëœë‹¤. ë§¨ ì•ì— ìˆëŠ” ìš”ì†ŒëŠ” ì—¬ì „íˆ ë¹ ì§€ì§€ë§Œ, window ë‚´ì˜ ê°ì†Œ ìˆ˜ì—´ì€ ìœ„ì™€ ê°™ì´ ë³€ê²½ë˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ì—¬ì „íˆ ìµœëŒ“ê°’ì€ ë§¨ ì•ì˜ ìš”ì†Œì´ë‹¤.

Popì„ í•˜ëŠ” ê³¼ì •ì—ì„œ ì¤‘ìš”í•œ ê²ƒì´ ìˆë‹¤. ë¬´ì¡°ê±´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§¨ ì•ì— ìˆëŠ” ìš”ì†Œë¥¼ ë¹¼ë©´ ì•ˆëœë‹¤. deqì— ë“¤ì–´ê°€ ìˆëŠ” ê²ƒì€ ìµœëŒ€ ê°ì†Œìˆ˜ì—´ì„ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ëŠ” indexì´ë‹¤. windowê°€ ì´ë™í•˜ë©´ì„œ ì œê±°ë˜ëŠ” indexê°€ deqì— ë“¤ì–´ê°€ìˆëŠ” ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ìš”ì†Œì˜ indexì™€ ê°™ì„ ë•Œ deqì•ˆì˜ ì›ì†Œë¥¼ ì§€ì›Œì¤˜ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ê·¸ë ‡ì§€ ì•Šì„ ê²½ìš° í•´ë‹¹ ìš”ì†ŒëŠ” ì—¬ì „íˆ ë„˜ì–´ê°€ëŠ” windowì•ˆì— ìˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ì§€ì›Œì§€ë©´ ì•ˆë˜ëŠ” ê°’ì´ë‹¤.

ê²°ë¡ 

  1. windowë‚´ì—ì„œ ìµœëŒ€ ê°ì†Œ ìˆ˜ì—´ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆì„ ë•Œ ìµœëŒ“ê°’ì€ ë§¨ ì• ìš”ì†Œì´ë‹¤.

  3. ì´ëŸ° ë°©ë²•ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆì„ ë•Œ, ì‹œê°„ ë³µì¡ë„ëŠ” Nì´ë‹¤.

ì´ëŸ° ë°©ë²•ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ë©´ ê²°êµ­ í•œë²ˆì˜ íƒìƒ‰ê³¼ì •ê³¼ ë™ì‹œì— ëª¨ë“  ìœˆë„ìš°ì—ì„œ ìµœëŒ“ê°’ì„ êµ¬í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤. ê·¸ë ‡ë‹¤ë©´ ìµœì†Ÿê°’ ì°¾ê¸°ì— ì´ ë°©ë²•ì„ ë„ì…í•´ë³´ì.

Code

#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

int N, L;
vector<int> v;
list<int> deq;

void pop_front(int index){
    // ì¦ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ìˆ˜ì—´ì˜ ë§¨ ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ê°€ ì§€ê¸ˆ ìœˆë„ìš°ì˜ ì‹œì‘ì ê³¼ ê°™ë‹¤ë©´ ì´ë™í•˜ë©´ì„œ ë¹¼ì¤€ë‹¤.
    // ë§Œì•½ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ë©´ ê·¸ ê°’ì„ ë¹¼ì£¼ë©´ ì•ˆëœë‹¤!
    if (!deq.empty() && deq.front() == index) {
        deq.pop_front();
    }
}

void push_back(int index){
    // í˜„ì¬ ìƒˆë¡œë“¤ì–´ì˜¨ indexë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì€ ì´ì „ì˜ ë…€ì„ë“¤ì€ ì¦ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ìˆ˜ì—´ì—ì„œ ì œê±°í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.
    while (!deq.empty() && v[deq.back()] > v[index]) {
        deq.pop_back();
    }
    deq.push_back(index);
}


int main(){
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL); cout.tie(NULL);
    cin >> N >> L;
    v.resize(N+1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) cin >> v[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
        push_back(i);
        cout << v[deq.front()] << ' ';
        // ì‹œì‘í•  ë•Œ window sizeë³´ë‹¤ ì‘ì€ indexëŠ” popì„ í•˜ì§€ì•Šê³  ë„£ì–´ì¤€ë‹¤.
        if (i - L >= 0) {
            pop_front(i - L + 1);
        }
    }
}
